title: Disconnected from PVP server in lobby and Champ select
body:
http://puu.sh/hP3hv/83b82b8269.jpg
I keep disconnecting from the lobby and in champ selects. This has become frustrating and has started happening to me last week. I don't have pando media booster.

I have no lag problems while in game.

replies.body:
Oh, you have two discussions about this.

Have you tried disabling your firewall/anti-virus if you have any?
